homeHeroDescription: "You don't create a photograph just with a camera. You create it with all the images you've seen, all the books you've read, all the music you've heard, and all the people you've loved.": Ansel Adams
locationSectionDesc: These are the cities I plan to visit soon for photoshoots. To book a session, click the button below and select your city. *I will contact you after booking for a free consultation.
artSectionDesc: I'm looking for people who are interested in artistic photoshoots at a discounted rate.  Please complete the contact form by clicking the button below, and I will get in touch with you.
aboutMeSectionUpperLeft: Moments in the frame - eternity in the heart.
aboutMeSectionFirstDesc: Hello there! I'm Elena, and I'm here to help us create a unique story through photographs.
aboutMeSectionSecondDesc: I aim to capture the most crucial events in your life by creating photos that look like scenes from a movie about you, with each shot filled with genuine emotions and authentic feelings. I'm looking forward to our photoshoot! Let's create a new story together.
explorePortfolioSectionDesc: I invite you to familiarize yourself with samples of my work.
bookSliderDiscount: When you buy several photoshoots at once, you get a discount. *You can also purchase a certificate for any type of shooting at a discount.
portfolioSectionDesc: Hi! Here you can see all photos!
